project.description: Running the automation script on epsilon machine

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "NODE_NAME=$NODE_NAME" echo "NODE_LABELS=$NODE_LABELS" hostname build_date=`date +%m-%d-%Y` echo "build date = <$build_date>" echo "USER=$USER" echo "HOME=$HOME" echo "PWD=$PWD"
==<get lastbuild>== rm buildNumber* rm u-boot-spl.bin* rm u-boot.itb*
wget https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/lastSuccessfulBuild/buildNumber lastSuccessfulBuild=`cat buildNumber` let "prevBuild = $lastSuccessfulBuild - 1" let "pprevBuild = $lastSuccessfulBuild - 2" echo "lastSuccessfulBuild = $lastSuccessfulBuild" echo "prevBuild = $prevBuild" echo "pprevBuild = $pprevBuild"
wget https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/$lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/FUSDK_build/sifive-fpga/u-boot-spl.bin
if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then wget https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/$prevBuild/artifact/FUSDK_build/sifive-fpga/u-boot-spl.bin if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then wget https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/$pprevBuild/artifact/FUSDK_build/sifive-fpga/u-boot-spl.bin
if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo "Can't find any binary. Please check binaries for FPGA is generated." exit 1 else buildID=$pprevBuild fi else buildID=$prevBuild fi else buildID=$lastSuccessfulBuild fi
rm u-boot-spl.bin*
echo "buildID=$buildID" uboot_spl_bin="$PWD/u-boot-spl.bin" uboot_itb_bin="$PWD/u-boot.itb"
# assume jenkins accquire epsilon properly # echo "===< Finding available epsilon server >===" # boardtest-alloc -t vcu118_nosd
# if [ "$SLURM_NODELIST" == "" ]; then # echo "No epsilon allocation, exit....." # exit 1 #fi
#nodeserver=`echo $SLURM_NODELIST | grep epsilon02`
#if [ "$nodeserver" == "" ]; then # echo "epsilon02 is in use, exit....." # exit 1 #fi
workdir=$PWD ls -al
# find USB COM port echo "===< Finding COM port >===" ttyUSB_list=`find -L /sys/bus/usb/devices/ -maxdepth 2 -name ttyUSB\* | sed 's=/[^/]*$==;s/\/$//'`
for sysdevpath in $ttyUSB_list ; do stand_serial_port=`cat $sysdevpath/interface`
if [ "$stand_serial_port" == "Standard Com Port" ]; then echo "found standard comp port at $sysdevpath" devnode=`find -L $sysdevpath/ -maxdepth 1 -name ttyUSB\* -exec basename \{} \;` echo "devnode is /dev/$devnode" fi done
if [ "$devnode" == "" ]; then echo "*** Error" echo "===< End of Finding COM port >===" exit 1 fi echo "===< End of Finding COM port >==="
echo "check repo" mkdir ~/bin PATH=~/bin:$PATH curl https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo > ~/bin/repo chmod a+x ~/bin/repo
cp /home/jackat/projects/mongoose/ipdelivery/viu75_256mc/viu75_256_210609_ipdelivery.tar.gz . tar zxvf viu75_256_210609_ipdelivery.tar.gz
echo "load python3" module load python/python/3.8.1
echo "fallback check" if ! python3 -c 'import sys; assert sys.version_info >= (3,6)' > /dev/null; then echo "python load failed" export PATH=/sifive/tools/python/python/3.8.1/bin:$PATH python3 --version fi
# pip3 install pyserial git submodule init; git submodule update --recursive
echo "download binaries from Build #$buildID" wget https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/$buildID/artifact/FUSDK_build/sifive-fpga/u-boot-spl.bin wget https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/view/Tools/job/syssw-automation/job/fusdk-meta-sifive-private/$buildID/artifact/FUSDK_build/sifive-fpga/u-boot.itb
set -x ls -al
./fpga_regression_tw/script/pro_fpga_run_linux.py \ -i ini_templates/vcu118_viu75_256mc_ymodem_on_epsilon.ini \ -p /dev/$devnode \ -l run.log -v \ -skip-gengdb \ -ubootspl $uboot_spl_bin \ -ubootitb $uboot_itb_bin\ -y -b2uboot result=$?
#exit
set +x exit $result
